offerAndAcceptance.offer: Alkermes US will provide transition services to Mural US as specified in the agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Mural US accepts the offer for these services under the terms set in the agreement.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties acknowledge the efficient transition and mutual benefits as outlined.

consideration.description: The Fees payable for Services under the Transition Service Schedule.
consideration.value: Fees and Expenses as specified in Article III.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties intend to create legal obligations through this agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The agreement is lawful and relates to the provision of services within corporate statutory frameworks.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Transition services to support Mural US operations post-Separation.
certaintyOfTerms.price: Fees detailed in the applicable Transition Service Schedules.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Performance is ongoing throughout the term as defined.

contract.consent: Consent is required for any modifications in services and for Third Party participation as outlined in Section 5.

durationAndTermination.duration: Duration is set to two years from the Effective Date with options for renewal.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Both parties may terminate for breach or under specific conditions noted in Article VI.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: One extension of up to six months may be mutually agreed upon prior to the end of the Term.

signatures.declaration: By Iain Brown, SVP, Chief Financial Officer
